archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.name: Guidelines
archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.documentation:
Implementation Governance is about overseeing and guiding the implementation of architecture projects to ensure they conform to the approved architecture.
In this context, guidelines are used to:
• Provide best practices and advisory material for solution development teams. • Help projects stay within architectural boundaries. • Guide decision-making where standards are silent or too rigid. • Support compliance assessments during project checkpoints and reviews.
